pullRequest.title: [BAEL 3739] -  Workarounds for String contains case insensitive in Java
pullRequest.bodyText:
Proposed Changes

Add the JMH dependencies
Shade the jar to avoid ERROR: Unable to find the resource: /META-INF/BenchmarkList
Add README file

Pull request checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

 Tests
 Build locally
 Code format / lint
 Docs have been reviewed and added

Pull request type
Please check the type of change your PR introduces:

 Bugfix
 Feature
 Code style update (formatting, renaming)
 Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
 Build related changes
 Documentation content changes
 Other (please describe):

commit.message: Fix one of the tests modifying "," by "."
Add JMH dependency and shade the jar. Include examples to avoid contains() case insensitive behavior
Undo the test fixing because is a wrong behavior in Windows
Rename the class to separate functionality from what the class is about
Add unit tests for Case Insensitive Contains workarounds
Add a refinement for clarity in the RegionMatches function

Modify "then" by "should" in the Unit Tests as suggested from code review

Co-Authored-By: KevinGilmore <kpg102@gmail.com>
